snippet.title: POPGOES Arcade Premium - Clip #2 - "The Machinist"
snippet.description:
Wishlist POPGOES Arcade on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986840/POPGOES_Arcade/

POPGOES and The Machinist is a bonus adventure in Popgoes the Weasel's story. It is packaged with the paid version of POPGOES Arcade. It's almost finished but still needs some things added or polished. Our goal is for it to add another 1.5 hours or so of content to the game. 

This is a small clip taken from the beginning of the game, showing a new currency, new NPCs, a new area, and a new mysterious villain...

These clips were made for Dawko's WWF Charity Stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfC024iDNqg

POPGOES Arcade: https://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/478668

Join my membership to access my Discord server and check out exclusive content: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kanecarter
